Desc.entry: A registered charity which offers English language teaching up to Entry Level 3 with "Life in the UK" material in incoporated into the teaching process. Volunteers help to run the classes and assisting in teaching. Welcomes new arrivals into the UK. Classes encourages confidence and assertiveness. Also provides a range of social activities including, sewing, conversation groups and a toy library. Holds an annual Eid party.
